Headline: #59 59th/61st Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 61st/Midway Plaisance
ShortDescription: 59 59th/61st EB buses are temporarily rerouted via 61st, Dorchester, 63rd, Stony Island and 59th: due to,street blockage near 61st/Midway Plaisance

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #59 59th/61st buses are temporarily rerouted via 61st, Dorchester, 63rd, Stony Island and 59th: due to,street blockage near 61st/Midway Plaisance

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
